name: Wight
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Wight and have them choose a player. Put the Haunted reminder token on the chosen player.
otherNightReminder: If the player with the Haunted reminder token on them was executed yesterday and; if the Wight is alive, put the Dead reminder token on a living player or; if the Wight is dead, put the Returned reminder token on the Wight.
ability: On your first night, choose a living player (not yourself); When they are executed, you are resurrected the following dawn. If you cannot be resurrected, a player dies instead.
